skill.name: Socializing
friendly.name: Friendly
friendly.desc: Gain additional friendship from talking to villagers
smoothtalker.name: Smooth Talker
smoothtalker.desc: Gain more friendship (and lose less) during heart events
gifter.name: Gifter
gifter.desc: Gain additional friendship from giving gifts
helpful.name: Helpful
haggler.name: Haggler
haggler.desc: Get a discount at shops when you are friends with the owner
beloved.name: Beloved
beloved.desc: Sometimes get gifts from your friends
dialogue.beloved: Take this.  I found it lying around the house.
dialogue.beloved.rare: Hey {{name}}, I think you might like this.
dialogue.beloved.superrare: I saw this, and I knew you'd love it.
config.ExperienceFromTalking.tooltip: Experience gained from talking to villagers
config.ExperienceFromGifts.tooltip: Experience gained from giving gifts to villagers
config.ExperienceFromQuests.tooltip: Experience gained from completeing bulletin board requests
config.FriendshipRecoveryPerLevel.toolti: Per level decrease in daily friendship decay when you don't talk to someone'
config.FriendlyExtraFriendship.tooltip: Extra friendship from talking to someone when you have the Friendly profession
config.SmoothTalkerPositiveMultiplier.to: Multiplies positive event responses by this amount when you have the Smooth Talker profession (keey > 1 to make responses better)
config.SmoothTalkerNegativeMultiplier.to: Multiplies negative event responses by this amount when you have the Smooth Talker profession (keep > 0 and < 1 to make responses better, but not positive)
config.GifterLovedGiftExtraFriendship.to: Extra friendship for loved gifts when you have the Gifter profession
config.GifterLikedGiftExtraFriendship.to: Extra friendship for liked gifts when you have the Gifter profession
Extra friendship for neutral gifts when you have the Gifter profession
config.HelpfulRewardMultiplier.tooltip: Multiplies quest reward money by this amount when you have the Helpful profession
config.HagglerMinHeartLevel.tooltip: Begins giving discounts when friendship is at this level when you have the Haggler profession
config.HagglerDiscountPercentPerHeartLev: Extra discount percent per heart level starting at the minimum heart level
config.BelovedGiftPercentChance.tooltip: Chance to get a gift from someone when you have the Beloved profession
config.BelovedGiftRarePercentChance.tool: Chance that a gift is rare
config.BelovedGiftSuperRarePercentChance: Chance that a rare gift is super rare
